mapper.select: SELECT T10.* FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR -- 계약번호 , T2.RCGVP_KNM -- 성명 , T1.VST_DUEDT -- 변경방문 예정일자 , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.VST_DUEDT, 'YYYYMMDD') - 30, 'YYYYMMDD') AS ALT_DEADLINE -- 변경마감일자 , '생활 맞춤형 필터 변경' AS WORK_NM -- 작업구분 , T1.PART_PD_CD -- 현재필터 (selectPartMaster: SVPD_NM_KOR) , T3.SVPD_NM_KOR FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T2.RCGVP_KNM , T1.DTL_CNTR_NO , T1.DTL_CNTR_SN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T2 ON T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T1.CNTR_ADRPC_ID WHERE T1.ADRPC_TP_CD = '3' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T1.VL_STRT_DTM AND T1.VL_END_DTM AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) T2 ON T2.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN () T3 ON T3.SVPD_PD_CD = T1.PART_PD_CD WHERE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.VST_DUEDT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMM') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.WK_DT IS NULL AND T1.MTR_CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} -- [조회 조건] AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} -- [조회 조건] ORDER BY T1.VST_DUEDT ) T10 WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT DISTINCT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.PDCT_PD_CD -- 제품상품코드 , T1.SV_PD_CD -- 서비스상품코드 , T3.FILT_CMU_CDV -- 필터공용코드값 , T3.FILT_CMU_NM -- 필터공용명 , T3.FILT_CMU_EPL -- 필터공용설명 , T3.CH_PDCT_PD_CD -- 변경제품상품코드(selectPartMaster: SVPD_NM_KOR) , T4.SVPD_NM_KOR FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T01.CNTR_NO , T01.CNTR_SN , T01.VST_DUEDT , MAX(T01.VST_DV_CD) AS VST_DV_CD , MAX(T01.VST_NMN_N) AS VST_NMN_N FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ T01 WHERE T01.VST_DUEDT = #{vstDuedt} -- [조회 조건] AND T01.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} -- [조회 조건] AND T01.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} -- [조회 조건] GROUP BY T01.CNTR_NO, T01.CNTR_SN, T01.VST_DUEDT ) T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_LVLH_CSTMW_FILT_BAS T3 ON T3.PDCT_PD_CD = T1.PDCT_PD_CD AND T3.SV_PD_CD = T1.SV_PD_CD AND T3.VST_DV_CD = T2.VST_DV_CD AND TO_NUMBER(T3.PRD_MM_VAL) = T2.VST_NMN_N INNER JOIN () T4 ON T4.SVPD_PD_CD = T3.CH_PDCT_PD_CD WHERE T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} -- [조회 조건] AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} -- [조회 조건]

SELECT T01.CNTR_NO , T01.CNTR_SN , T01.FST_RGST_DT -- 요청일자 , T01.CNTR -- 계약번호 , T01.VST_PROM_DT -- 적용예정일 , CASE T01.RN WHEN 1 THEN '등록' ELSE '변경' END REQUEST -- 요청 , T01.SVPD_NM_KOR -- 등록필터 , T01.USR_NM -- 등록자 , T01.CHANNEL -- 채널 , T01.STATUS -- 상태 FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.FST_RGST_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS FST_RGST_DT -- 요청일자 , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR -- 계약번호 , T1.VST_PROM_DT -- 적용예정일 , T1.SAVE_SN -- 요청 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SUBSTR(VST_PROM_DT,1,6) ORDER BY SAVE_SN) AS RN -- 요청 , T1.CSTMW_FILT_PD_CD -- 등록필터 (selectPartMaster의 SVPD_NM_KOR) , T4.SVPD_NM_KOR -- 등록필터 (selectPartMaster의 SVPD_NM_KOR) , T2.USR_NM -- 등록자 , CASE T3.OG_TP_CD WHEN 'W02' THEN '매니저' WHEN 'W02' THEN '엔지니어' ELSE '상담사' END CHANNEL -- 채널 , CASE WHEN T1.VST_PROM_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN '완료' ELSE NULL END STATUS -- 상태 FROM TB_SVPD_BFSVC_NX_VST_PROM_IZ T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMP_USR_ACO_M T2 ON T2.USR_ID = T1.FST_RGST_USR_ID AND T2.DEL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T2.FST_RGST_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMM') AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T2.EPNO INNER JOIN () T4 ON T4.SVPD_PD_CD = T1.CSTMW_FILT_PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} -- [조회 조건] AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} -- [조회 조건] ORDER BY T1.VST_PROM_DT DESC , T1.SAVE_SN DESC ) T01
